message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe would significantly enhance your endeavors and contribute greatly to your success. Given its intrinsic value and the benefits it offers, I propose a transaction price of $1,200,000. This amount reflects not only the product's worth but also the potential it holds for you. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and look forward to discussing the details further with you.
